summary: The Department of Defense funds research centers at nonprofits, universities, and companies, which provide objective expertise on complex scientific and technical issues. Organizations within DOD collect data on research center performance each year and more comprehensively review center work at least once every 5 years. DOD's Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Research and Engineering receives the comprehensive reviews as part of its...
title: Federal Research Centers: Revising DOD Oversight Policy Could Assure Access to Performance and Effectiveness Information
